name: Umbra (Laetitia)
description:
• Umbra is a relaxing game where your only goal is to take care of the dog and enjoy your stay.
  • It's unfinished but still ongoing ; I'm working on it during my free time.
  • Use Z,Q,S,D to move and the special inputs U,M,B,R, A to interact with the dog when near and facing it in many special ways, including amazing sparkles made by my hand. ✨
